snippet: Connecticut routed St. John’s in the semifinals of the Big East tournament, advancing to a title-game matchup with Notre Dame, which beat West Virginia.
abstract: College Basketball Women's Roundup; Connecticut routes St John’s, 74-43, in the Big East tournament semifinals; advances to title-game matchup against Notre Dame, which beat West Virginia, 73-45; other women's and men's results noted.
lead_paragraph: Connecticut routed St. John’s in the semifinals of the Big East tournament, advancing to a title-game matchup with Notre Dame, which beat West Virginia.

headline.seo: Connecticut and Notre Dame Meet in Big East Final Again
headline.main: Rematch for UConn and Notre Dame
headline.print_headline: Rematch for UConn and Notre Dame
